npc.generic.2.first.1: Um, welcome. I'm ... %npc%. I hope you’ll like it here.
npc.generic.2.first.2: Hi... I’m not used to seeing new faces around here. I'm %npc%... nice to meet you.
npc.generic.2.first.3: Oh, um, hello... I didn’t expect to meet someone new today...
npc.generic.2.greeting.1: Hi %player%... Um, did you need something??
npc.generic.2.greeting.2: Oh, it’s you... I’m glad you’re back.
npc.generic.2.greeting.3: Oh, hi %player% again... It’s nice to see you...
npc.generic.2.talk.1: Life here is... quiet. I like it, but sometimes I wish for more.
npc.generic.2.talk.2: I... um, I saw some bunnies the other day. They were... very cute
npc.generic.2.talk.3: Um, I was thinking... Do you ever wonder what’s out there beyond the village?
npc.generic.2.follow.yes.1: Alright... I’ll be right behind you.
npc.generic.2.follow.yes.2: Sure... I’ll go with you. Just... stay close, okay?
npc.generic.2.follow.no.1: I appreciate the offer, but... I should stay here for now.
npc.generic.2.follow.no.2: I’m sorry... I can’t, not right now.
npc.generic.2.follow.stop.1: Ok... see you then. Be careful, okay?
npc.generic.2.follow.stop.2: Alright... I’ll stay here until you need me.
npc.generic.2.dating.yes.1: I... I never thought you’d ask. Yes, let’s give it a try.
npc.generic.2.dating.yes.2: Oh... I didn’t expect that. But, yes, I’d love to.
npc.generic.2.dating.yes.3: R-really? Um, yes, I’d like that...
npc.generic.2.dating.no.1: I’m not sure I can do that... I’m sorry.
npc.generic.2.dating.no.2: Oh... I’m sorry, but I can’t. I hope you’re not upset.
npc.generic.2.dating.no.3: I’m... I’m really sorry, but I don’t think I’m ready for that.
npc.generic.2.marry.yes.1: Oh my... Yes, of course! I’ve dreamed of this...
npc.generic.2.marry.yes.2: I... I can’t believe you asked. Yes, I’ll be with you forever.
npc.generic.2.marry.yes.3: Y-yes... I can’t believe this is happening. I’d love to marry you.
npc.generic.2.marry.no.1: Oh... I wish I could, but I don’t think I can.
npc.generic.2.marry.no.2: This is hard to say, but... no, I’m not ready for that.
npc.generic.2.marry.no.3: I’m sorry... I can’t. I’m not ready for something so big.
npc.generic.2.divorce.success.1: This is really hard, but... I’ll let you go if that’s what you need.
npc.generic.2.divorce.success.2: It’s... it’s over then. I’ll always remember what we had.
npc.generic.2.divorce.success.3: Oh... I didn’t think this would happen. I guess... this is goodbye.
npc.generic.2.divorce.fail.1: I... I’m not sure what you mean. We were never together.
npc.generic.2.divorce.fail.2: I think there’s a misunderstanding... We were never married.
npc.generic.2.divorce.fail.3: Wait... What? We were never married...
npc.generic.2.procreation.fail.1: I... I don’t think having a child is right for me, not now.
npc.generic.2.procreation.fail.2: I’ve thought about it, but... I don't think now is the right time.
npc.generic.2.procreation.fail.3: I... I’m not ready for that kind of responsibility. I’m sorry.
npc.generic.2.hate: Oh... I’m sorry, but I really don’t like this.
npc.generic.2.dislike: I... I appreciate it, but I’m not sure what to do with this.
npc.generic.2.like: Oh, this is... really nice. Thank you %player%.
npc.generic.2.gift.default: This is okay... Thanks for thinking of me.
